name: Skootar Co Ltd
description: Developer of an online courier service booking platform designed to deliver goods and parcels in a convenient and reliable way. The company's online courier service booking platform matches the customer's request for document, parcel and food delivery with on-demand motorbike messenger and delivers the packages in a single trip, enabling customers to design their document workflow routes and get their things delivered quickly.
one_liner: Developer of an online courier service booking platform designed to deliver goods and parcels in a convenient and reliable way. The company's online courier service booking platform matches the customer's request for document, parcel and food delivery with on-demand motorbike messenger and delivers the packages in a single trip, enabling customers to design their document workflow routes and get their things delivered quickly.
